name: GameMaker Studio 2 Desktop

task.app: d3dx9 d9vk d3dxof d3dcompiler_47 cmd allcodecs dotnet452 dxvk gdiplus wininet winhttp vcrun2017
task.name: winetricks

content:
script:
  game:
    exe: $GAMEDIR/GameMakerStudio.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
  installer:
    task:
      app: d3dx9 d9vk d3dxof d3dcompiler_47 cmd allcodecs dotnet452 dxvk gdiplus wininet
        winhttp vcrun2017
      name: winetricks
      prefix: $GAMEDIR
  system:
    terminal: true
